messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! My name is Kim and I have 2 children (5 and 3).  Right now we live in NC where the compulsory age is 7 so I haven t had to do anything with the
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!

My name is Kim and I have 2 children (5 and 3). Right now we live in NC where the compulsory age is 7 so I haven't had to do anything with the state yet. But we'll be moving to SC in Dec/Jan with my dh who's stationed there, and the compulsory age there is 5. Is there anyone who lives in SC who has any advice for me as far as the laws go? I looked over the laws and it looks like option #3 would be the best one (because you don't have to deal with the public schools) but I was hoping somebody could give me some real life experience with SC law and unschooling.

Thanks!!

Kim : )
